title: Self-Directed Learning Scaffolding MOOC Design for Icelandic Language

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience (grammar/vocabulary) and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Self-Directed Learning Course for Enhancing Icelandic Communication Competency in Simulation/VR Environments with Learner-Tailored Scaffolding Strategies

learning_goals: Within three months, learners can compose texts with 80% accuracy using basic Icelandic grammar structures.
Learners can demonstrate conversational expressions required for everyday situations (e.g., shopping, navigation) with 90% fluency in VR simulation environments.
Learners achieve self-directed learning management skills at 85% or higher in weekly learning planning and execution evaluations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
